name: Sweet Slayer
description:
This game was made by Vancouver Film School game design students as their final project

Sweet Slayer is a local co-op first-person shooter game where where players get to be a Broccoli and a Cauliflower soldiers, fighting to take over the food world from the candies control by destroying their castle.

Players will have a Gun that shoots nut ammo and alternates between two modes: the Acorn, which works as a burst riffle, and the Nutgun, that works like a shotgun.

The Corn Captain will guide the players on this mission as they move deeper into the enemy's field, explode the castle, and escape it alive as they fight monstrous Lollipops, Mazapans, and Gingerbread Mans.

Go for their heads, and save the vegetables from being candified!
